titleStmt.title: The skilfull mountebanke. Or, Come, and I'le cure you It hath not so much power as patience, yet 'tis a playster for all sores. By Ioannes Baptista Guardano Lodovico puncto. A Frenchified Italian, and borne in Bucklersberry.
titleStmt.author: Joannes Baptista Guardano Lodovico puncto.

titleStmt.title: The skilfull mountebanke. Or, Come, and I'le cure you It hath not so much power as patience, yet 'tis a playster for all sores. By Ioannes Baptista Guardano Lodovico puncto. A Frenchified Italian, and borne in Bucklersberry.
titleStmt.author: Joannes Baptista Guardano Lodovico puncto.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I[ohn] O[kes] for Thomas Lambert and are to bee sold at his shop neere the hospitall gate in Smithfield, at the signe of the Horse-shooe,

notesStmt.note: Joannes Baptista Guardano Lodovico puncto is a pseudonym.
Reproduction of a photostat of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
